name: Rematch
description: This game is made in just 1 week . I admit it has many bugs and has many phase of development to go through... This is a 3 man multiplayer game where you play with each controllers . Controls of this game is easy to follow and has a very fast learning curve and yes this is my first game project . Hope you guys like it . I have spent a lot of time making this so please try to give me positive feed backs and also try to motivate me . And lastly I would like to say this game is inspired by Monkeys with guns.
